feature1.explanation: Both texts use similar punctuation styles with consistent use of commas, periods, and other standard punctuation marks.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a formal and professional tone with consistent lexical and grammatical features.

feature3.explanation: Both texts are structured similarly with clear and concise sentences, maintaining coherence and cohesion.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were observed in either text.

overall.explanation: Considering the consistent punctuation style, formal tone, structured sentences, common discourse style, and absence of errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
